flash-sale.Name: Olivia Double Garden Day Bed with Adjustable Canopy - Light  Grey
flash-sale.Body:
A great addition to any garden or patio, Olivia Double Day Bed is the latest innovative piece of garden furniture for anyone looking space saving zero-maintenance designer daybed.

Product Description

1 x Daybed with Canopy 

1 x Rotating Ottoman

3 x Large Pillows

Product Size

Closed Size: W80 x D163 x H74cm 

Opened Size:150 x D163 x H143cm

Daybed cushion size: W90 x D90 x H10cm 

Ottoman cushion size: W61 x D70 x H15cm

Pillow Size: W42.4 x D42x H20cm

 

Protect your Olivia Double Day Bed with our Outdoor Cover

Time to Relax

Olivia Day Bed is simple to make up and easy to store.

This superb product is constructed using an Aluminium frame and PE rattan, the cushions are covered in spun polyester covers as are the pillows.

It is suitable for all weather and the cushions are shower proof.

It’s time to sit down, relax and enjoy your Olivia Daybed.

flash-sale.Name: Rattan Companion Bistro Set -  Table and Two Chairs
flash-sale.Body:
Consisting of two comfortable high back armchairs and a glass-topped table which tidily put in between, the Companion Set is an excellent place to sit back, relax and enjoy the sunshine. Its table is generously sized and provides more than enough space for drinks and snacks. The Companion Set is ideal for creating a comfortable corner to sit, chat and enjoy being outside.

 

Product Description

  • Weatherproof rattan weave
  • Powder-coated long lasting Steel frame
  • Includes base and back cushions, grey colour
  • Showerproof cushions that should be taken indoors when not in use
  • During the winter months we recommend storing in a dry and well-ventilated area, ensuring it is clean and dry before storage
  • These items requires light and quick assembly

Time to Relax

Relax with friends or loved ones on the Rattan Companion Set. This lovely set would look stunning in a corner of your garden, instantly creating a romantic space you will want to spend lingering hours in.

The Set consists of 

2 x KD Armchair size: 68x68x82cm

2 x Footstool size: 52x46x34cm

1 x KD coffee table size: 45x45x51cm with clear glass top

 

*Please note, to ensure safe delivery, this product is delivered on a pallet

office-furniture.Name: Electric Height Adjustable Sit And Stand Desk For Home Office
office-furniture.Body:
Sit-Stand Desks are designed to encourage an active and productive work style. An intuitive backlit memory controller, available in black or white, empowers the user to change their posture effortlessly with a single touch. Frame colours include soft black or smooth white that complements any interior design. Desktops are available in black, white and walnut. 

Constructed from hard wearing and durable powder coated steel, the adjustable desk also features built in collision avoidance to detect any obstructions.

Product Description

  • Weight Capacity - 125kg/275lbs
  • Width - 100-150cm
  • Height - 62-128cm
  • Maximum Speed - 36mm/s
  • Touch Control Panel
  • Power Input - 100-240v
  • Desktop Measures 150x75x2.5cm
  • Motors are thermal and overload protected.
  • Material: Steel Frame, ‎Particle Board Desktop

 

Control Panel Features

  • Digital LED Memory Controller with Light Indicator: for best customizable settings
  • 2 Programmable Memory with Sit/Stand Time Reminder: pre-sets save your desired height
  • Programmable Proprietary Gyro-Current Collision Avoidance System: improved sensing technology for better detection of soft and hard objects in the movement path
  • CM/Inch conversion
  • Programmable height range: customizes the minimum and maximum height settings to accommodate objects around you, such as under desk cabinets or storage units
  • Child Safety Lock
  • Easy-Assembly: advanced frame design reduces set-up time while providing long-term stability for confident daily use

 

Warranty

Our Sit and Stand desks include 3 year manufacturer's warranty.

furniture.Code: YBG-8009 - ELEANOR DOUBLE FOLDING HANGING CHAIR - CHARCOAL/GREY
furniture.Name: Eleanor Double Folding Hanging Chair - Charcoal/Grey
furniture.Body:
This cosy and comfortable Eleanor Double Folding Hanging Chair is the perfect spot for two people to relax and enjoy the garden. 

This hanging egg chair has a sturdy steel frame and holds an aluminium framed double cocoon chair. It is finished with stylish synthetic rattan, Terylene rope and a large comfortable seat and back cushions. This chair features an innovative folding design meaning it can be folded down for easy storage when not in use.

Product Description:

  • Sturdy steel support frame
  • Aluminium chair frame
  • Synthetic resin and Terylene
  • Suitable for all weathers
  • Flat packed for all weathers
  • Innovative fold-away design
  • Packed in a Small Carton
  • Comfortable cushion
  • Colour: Charcoal/Grey
  • Colours available: Charcoal/Grey or Latte/Cappuccino

 

Protect your Eleanor Double Folding Hanging Chair with our Outdoor Cover

 

 

Time to Relax:

Have a seat with a friend or loved one and enjoy the garden in style with this Eleanor Double Folding Hanging Chair. It makes use of a fold away design which allows it be easily stored away when not in use.

Dimension:

Total Height 196cm

Total Length 160cm

Total Width 110cm

 

Warranty

1 Year warranty

 

Additional Information

The maximum load weight for this item is 220kg

This product is delivered on a pallet

winawood-ad-ons.Name: Personalised Plaques for Winawood Benches, Love Seats, and Armchairs
winawood-ad-ons.Body:
Get a Winawood Personalised Plaques FREE of charge with any Winawood purchase

 

 

Create the perfect Engraved Personalised Plaque to treasure a special moment.

Maison and Garden's plaques are made from Premium Acrylic material, which is lightweight, rust resistant and easy to clean and maintain. They are suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

By using the highest quality 3M Adhesive Tape our plaques achieve outstanding adhesion and deliver excellent shear strength. They are also resistant to water, humidity and hot/cold weather.  

We also give you the option to add drill holes to your plaque for an alternative fixing method. These are positioned identically on each side of the plaque so you don’t risk damaging your special personalised message.

 

Product Description 

  • Easy to clean/maintain
  • Lightweight
  • Customisable
  • Suitable for indoor and outdoor
  • No rusting or warping
  • Strong 3M Adhesive Tape 467MP
  • Drilled Hole option 

 

How to personalise your Plaque

Design your Personalised Plaque exactly how you desire using our simple options selection.  

Choose the plaque style, a colour and a text font, then simply express your sentiments and we will engrave your plaque with care.

Fit your Personalised Plaque on Winawood

Screw or stick your personalised plaques on any Winawood products such as Tables, Armchairs, Love Seats and Benches.

2) Life isn't measured by the number of breaths you take, but by the moments that take your breath away

3) Never be afraid to sit awhile and think

2) Another year to create precious memories together. Another year to discover new things to enjoy about each other. And another year to strengthen a marriage that defines forever. Happy anniversary!

Product Description:

  • Fully weatherproof
  • No special treatment required
  • Easy to assemble
  • Fully recyclable
  • Wood grain effect finish
  • Love Seat Colour: Duck Egg Green 
  • Cushion Colour: Natural
  • Also available in Stone Grey, Powder Blue, New Teak

* Please refer to the colour swatches above, product colour may slightly vary due to photographic lighting sources or monitor settings.


Why Winawood:

Natural Grain Effect: This gives our unique product a natural wood effect, while effectively being made from recycled polymer material.
 
Fully Recyclable: Winawood is made from recycled polymer materials, this reduces the need to grow, harvest or extract new raw materials from the Earth.

Winawood is fully recyclable, meaning that the materials can be reused and converted into future products. 

Fully Weatherproof: Sandwick can be kept outside and uncovered 365 days a year, looking as good as the day it was purchased.

No Special Treatment Required: To maintain the unique finish, we recommend wiping the product with a cloth and warm water or, for stubborn stains, feel free to use a pressure hose. Due to the material having been dyed throughout the product, we recommend a light sanding to restore the colour when this might be needed. Each bench comes with a small sanding block for easy maintenance.

Easy to Assemble: This collection takes 15 minutes to assemble, all tools and fittings required are in the box.

Stainless Steel Bolts: These are stronger and corrosion resistant and are used for their endurance quality and long lasting durability. Stainless steel bolts can last a long time without being replaced or breaking.





Product Dimension:

Cushion: Length 56cm x Depth 44cm x Height 5cm
  

Love Seat: Length 62.5cm x Depth 60cm x Height 93.5cm
 
 

Warranty:

The product includes a 3 year manufacturer's warranty.
This protects the bench against any manufacture defects within the first 36 months of purchase.

Product Description:

* Please refer to the colour swatches above, product colour may slightly vary due to photographic lighting sources or monitor settings.


Why Winawood:

Natural Grain Effect: This gives our unique product a natural wood effect, while effectively being made from recycled polymer material.
 
Fully Recyclable: Winawood is made from recycled polymer materials, this reduces the need to grow, harvest or extract new raw materials from the Earth.

Winawood is fully recyclable, meaning that the materials can be reused and converted into future products. 

Fully Weatherproof: Winawood can be kept outside and uncovered 365 days a year, looking as good as the day it was purchased.

No Special Treatment Required: To maintain the unique finish, we recommend wiping the product with a cloth and warm water or, for stubborn stains, feel free to use a pressure hose. Due to the material having been dyed throughout the product, we recommend a light sanding to restore the colour when this might be needed. Each bench comes with a small sanding block for easy maintenance.

Easy to Assemble: This collection takes 15 minutes to assemble, all tools and fittings required are in the box.

Stainless Steel Bolts: These are stronger and corrosion resistant and are used for their endurance quality and long lasting durability. Stainless steel bolts can last a long time without being replaced or breaking.



Winawood Cushion:

Our Winawood original, made to measure, embroidered bench cushions are the perfect addition to add style and comfort to your Winawood product.
